MajorClaims.MC1: I completely disagree with this statement that we should replace normal course with online course
MajorClaims.MC2: I personally disagree this this notion that we should replace classroom with online class

Claims.C1: it should not replace classroom learning
Claims.C2: learning in classroom could provide more information and make students more comprehend in subjects that they had learnt
Claims.C3: online class could not provide knowledge about social skills
Claims.C4: learning in classroom, student could have healthier life
Claims.C5: having classroom could provide abundant skills to students

Premises.P1: Learning in classroom could provide more information to study
Premises.P2: learning in classroom are not only learning academic skills but also learning social skills, and learning how to solve problem in real situation
Premises.P3: in classroom have many equipment to demonstrate real example
Premises.P4: in biology class, learning anatomy by operating fog have many benefits
Premises.P5: Learner could learn how to use tools and see actual organs of fog
Premises.P6: online class just only study in textbook not learnin real situation
Premises.P7: This important skill cannot be gotten in online classes
Premises.P8: In a classroom, teacher could give assignment to student to work as a group
Premises.P9: This could help students to learn how to deal with people, how to collaborate with people in their group
Premises.P10: in school can provide exercise class which train student to move their body
Premises.P11: Classroom have specialist trainer to teach students to it right way
Premises.P12: If student do it by themselves, they might be hurt themselves
Premises.P13: This make students have healthier life which online class cannot provide
Premises.P14: classroom could provide real actual example to make students more understand in their subject
Premises.P15: classroom courses are also provide students to learn social skill
Premises.P16: classroom could provide exercise class to set students to have a good health
